name: BattleBots Gauntlet
description:
BattleBots Gauntlet is a multiplayer 3D platformer where upt to 4 players must race through a gauntlet, collecting coins and trying to get to the end first.

This was our first lengthy development project, with 3 weeks to concept and 5 to develop. Although it ended up missing some features, such as death traps and a randomizer that would have given the player random abilities such as a triple jump or super speed. Overall though this was a great learning experience.

Development Team:
Unoffical Producer and Lead designer: Jack Sexton
Game Designer: Aaron Stratford
Programmers: Sam Murphy and Daniel Vernon
Artists: Trent Hocking, Cj Gardner, Jonathan Ciminelli and Pippa Lewis
All IP Rights belong to the team/AIE
